articles.title: Indian-American Math Genius Nikhil Srivastava Among 3 To Solve Famous 1959 Problem, Win Prize - NDTV
articles.description: Eminent Indian-American mathematician Nikhil Srivastava, who teaches at the University of California, Berkeley, has been jointly selected for the inaugural Ciprian Foias Prize in Operator Theory by American Mathematical Society (AMS).
